thread.title: These People Got Their Ear Wax Extracted For The First Time And It Was Grossly Hilarious
thread.title_full: These People Got Their Ear Wax Extracted For The First Time And It Was Grossly Hilarious

author: Alex Choi
title: These People Got Their Ear Wax Extracted For The First Time And It Was Grossly Hilarious
text:
View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10744735 2. You can watch the full video here: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=JkjzAwIYxUI . BuzzFeedBlue / Via youtube.com ID: 10749523 3. As Dr. Karimi explains, Asian earwax is a little different and tends to be dryer and more brittle. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10744751 4. Kane was up first and his ears were completely impacted with wax. What a glorious sight. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749754 5. Mikala went next, and her ears helped support Dr. Karimi’s statement: Using Q-tips to “clean your ears” is usually the main culprit for having wax stuck deep in the ear canal. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749719 6. Jess, who never uses Q-tips, went last. All of her wax was pushed to the front of her ear canal, which is what’s SUPPOSED to happen. GO JESS! View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749739 7. However, Jess wasn’t all golden. Dr. Karimi noticed a bruise deep inside her ear that was from scratching days before. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749768 8. Next, Dr. Karimi used a suction to harvest all those cornflakes. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749845 9. Mikala couldn’t believe what she was seeing. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749862 10. After unhinging it from the skin, the doctor grabbed the wax with special tweezers. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749877 11. Then Mikala thought the doctor had done the unspeakable. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749906 12. Last up was Kane. And his wax was ginormous. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10749999 13. It was all pretty hard to believe. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10750010 14. Kane’s other ear was just as blocked. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10750048 15. The aftermath was truly a sight to behold. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10750075 16. Curious to get your ears checked now? View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10750099 17. Special thanks to Dr. Kian Karimi of Pacific Eye And Ear. ID: 10750106 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
